Supportive measures involve advising the patient to avoid rubbing the eye, wear protective eyewear during activities, and rest the eye as tolerated. Educate the patient on maintaining eye hygiene and recognizing signs of worsening condition, such as increased redness, pain, vision changes, or discharge.
